isis.stitle: 5 SPEED AND 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES - ASSEMBLE - MAINSHAFT ASSEMBLY (FS-6205/6305)

svcproc.title: MAINSHAFT ASSEMBLY (FS-6205/6305)

note.para: Lubricate the gear bearing bores, gear hub faces, split washers, synchronizer friction surfaces, synchronizer cups and the mainshaft with transmission lube as the mainshaft is assembled. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for recommended lubes.

svcproc.para: The following step numbers correspond to the numbers in Figure 129.

step1.para: With the mainshaft rear facing up, install the mainshaft assembly vertically in a vise.
Install reverse gear bearings with a spacer between the bearings.
Install reverse gear with reverse gear clutching teeth down.
Install reverse gear washer. Washer can be installed either way.
Use a sleeve type bearing driver or heat lamp and install the rear mainshaft bearing.

svcproc.para: The following step numbers correspond to the numbers in Figure 130.

step1.para: With the mainshaft front facing up, install mainshaft assembly vertically in a vise.
Install 1st-reverse synchronizer.
Install 1st gear bearings with a spacer between the bearings.
Install 1st gear with 1st gear clutching teeth down.
Install locating ball and washer in the mainshaft groove. Washer can be installed either way.
Install snap ring in the mainshaft groove.
Install 2nd gear bearings with a spacer between the bearings.
Install 2nd gear with 2nd gear clutching teeth up.
Install 2nd-3rd clutch hub with 2nd-3rd clutch hub stepped face up.
Install snap ring in the mainshaft groove.
Install 2nd-3rd speed synchronizer and cups.
Install 3rd gear bearings with a spacer between the bearings.
Install 3rd gear with 3rd gear clutching teeth down.
Install locating ball and washer. Washer can be installed either way.
Install snap ring in the mainshaft groove.
Install 4th gear bearings with a spacer between the bearings.
Install 4th gear with 4th gear clutching teeth up.
Install 4th-5th clutch hub with 4th-5th clutch hub shoulder end facing down.
Install 4th-5th speed synchronizer and cups.
Use a sleeve type driver and install the front mainshaft bearing.

svcproc.para: Make sure the mainshaft gears rotate freely.
